testcase.name: Unauthorized user tries to get all books
Users retrieves a list of books when at least one book is in database
Users retrieves an empty response when no books in database

failure.message: 1 expectation failed. JSON path doesn't match. Expected: an empty collection Actual: <[{id=1, title=the gambler 4, author=Fyodar 4}, {id=2, title=, author=}, {id=3, title=cucumber, author=jane}, {id=4, title=The Silent Patient, author=Alex Michaelides}, {id=5, title=null, author=Fyodar Dhosteyoski}]>
